## Classes Index

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub">ControlFlowHub</a></>}>
Given a set of branch descriptors &#91;BB, Succ0, Succ1&#93;, create a &quot;hub&quot; such that the control flow from each BB to a successor is now split into two edges, one from BB to the hub and another from the hub to the successor. <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="struct"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor">BranchDescriptor</a></>}>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Utilities to manipulate the CFG and restore SSA for the new control flow.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;UTILS&#95;CONTROLFLOWUTILS&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;TRANSFORMS&#95;UTILS&#95;CONTROLFLOWUTILS&#95;H</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/smallvector-h">llvm/ADT/SmallVector.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stringref-h">llvm/ADT/StringRef.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Given a set of branch descriptors &#91;BB, Succ0, Succ1&#93;, create a &quot;hub&quot; such</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that the control flow from each BB to a successor is now split into two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// edges, one from BB to the hub and another from the hub to the successor. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// hub consists of a series of guard blocks, one for each outgoing block. Each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// guard block conditionally branches to the corresponding outgoing block, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the next guard block in the chain. These guard blocks are returned in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// argument vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This also updates any PHINodes in the successor. For each such PHINode, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// operands corresponding to incoming blocks are moved to a new PHINode in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// hub, and the hub is made an operand of the original PHINode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that for some block BB with a conditional branch, it is not necessary</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// that both successors are rerouted. The client specifies this by setting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// either Succ0 or Succ1 to nullptr, in which case, the corresponding successor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is not rerouted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Input CFG:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ----------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                    Def</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                     v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           In1      In2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///            |        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///            |        |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///            v        v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  Foo ---&gt; Out1     Out2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                     |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                     v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                    Use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Create hub: Incoming = &#123;In1, In2&#125;, Outgoing = &#123;Out1, Out2&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ----------------------------------------------------------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///             Def</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///              |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///              v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  In1        In2          Foo</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   |    Hub   |            |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   |    + - - | - - +      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   |    &#39;     v     &#39;      V</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   +------&gt; Guard1 -----&gt; Out1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        &#39;     |     &#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        &#39;     v     &#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        &#39;   Guard2 -----&gt; Out2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        &#39;           &#39;      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        + - - - - - +      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                           v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                          Use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Limitations:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// -----------</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 This assumes that all terminators in the CFG are direct branches (the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    &quot;br&quot; instruction). The presence of any other control flow such as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    indirectbr, switch or callbr will cause an assert.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 The updates to the PHINodes are not sufficient to restore SSA</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    form. Consider a definition Def, its use Use, incoming block In2 and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    outgoing block Out2, such that:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    a. In2 is reachable from D or contains D.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    b. U is reachable from Out2 or is contained in Out2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    c. U is not a PHINode if U is contained in Out2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    Clearly, Def dominates Out2 since the program is valid SSA. But when the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    hub is introduced, there is a new path through the hub along which Use is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    reachable from entry without passing through Def, and SSA is no longer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    valid. To fix this, we need to look at all the blocks post-dominated by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    the hub on the one hand, and dominated by Out2 on the other. This is left</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    for the caller to accomplish, since each specific use of this function</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    may have additional information which simplifies this fixup. For example,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    see restoreSSA() in the UnifyLoopExits pass.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub">ControlFlowHub</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a006f7967889c12cbebbeb5657b6d6a3a">BranchDescriptor</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a1ec7584aaecc2d1f91cc5b9ef5393fc4"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a1ec7584aaecc2d1f91cc5b9ef5393fc4">BB</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a66dee10829b8ce701edee102a265fb36"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a66dee10829b8ce701edee102a265fb36">Succ0</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#ae950cdc3262556e3cd2e05bec93cc27e"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#ae950cdc3262556e3cd2e05bec93cc27e">Succ1</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a006f7967889c12cbebbeb5657b6d6a3a"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a006f7967889c12cbebbeb5657b6d6a3a">BranchDescriptor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a1ec7584aaecc2d1f91cc5b9ef5393fc4">BB</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a66dee10829b8ce701edee102a265fb36">Succ0</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#ae950cdc3262556e3cd2e05bec93cc27e">Succ1</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">        : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a1ec7584aaecc2d1f91cc5b9ef5393fc4">BB</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a1ec7584aaecc2d1f91cc5b9ef5393fc4">BB</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a66dee10829b8ce701edee102a265fb36">Succ0</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#a66dee10829b8ce701edee102a265fb36">Succ0</a>), <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#ae950cdc3262556e3cd2e05bec93cc27e">Succ1</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/controlflowhub/branchdescriptor/#ae950cdc3262556e3cd2e05bec93cc27e">Succ1</a>) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
